Idea #1: EducateMe - A mobile app that provides personalized learning experiences for students.
Idea #2: MindMate - A mobile app that helps users manage their mental health and well-being.
Idea #3: SustainableLife - A mobile app that helps users live more sustainably.
Idea #4: FitFinder - A mobile app that helps users find fitness classes and workouts tailored to their needs.
Idea #5: RecipeGenie - A mobile app that generates personalized recipes based on users' dietary preferences and ingredient availability.
